articles.author: William Schomberg, Sarah Young
articles.title: UK recession might be under way after economy shrinks in Q3 - Reuters UK
articles.description: Britain's economy might be in a recession, according to data that showed it shrank between July and September, shortly after finance minister Jeremy Hunt took the rare step of suggesting the Bank of England might cut interest rates to boost growth.
articles.content: LONDON, Dec 22 (Reuters) - Britain's economy might be in a recession, according to data that showed it shrank between July and September, shortly after finance minister Jeremy Hunt took the rare step… [+3751 chars]
